About this site

```{r}
#| eval: false


library(fs)
library(stringr)
rmd_names <- dir_ls(path = ".", glob = "*.Rmd")
qmd_names <- str_replace(string = rmd_names,
                         pattern = "Rmd",
                         replacement = "qmd")
file_move(path = rmd_names,
          new_path = qmd_names)

```
